title: Her Fantastic Adventures
overview: The drama is adapted from the novel "The Meridian Gate" by Ying Zhao. It tells the story of Qi Chun Jiao, an athletic girl who unexpectedly transforms into Gu Qingqiao, the daughter of a tavern owner in ancient times. Alongside Duan Yu, Lu Zizheng, Ruan Siqiong, and others, she embarks on a time-traveling adventure to seek out spirits and treasure. Ultimately, they find familial love, romantic love, and friendship, reconcile with their imperfect selves, and discover their life direction in this light-hearted, romantic, and inspirational story.
